title: Hey, who decided Swain's W should be Quickcast only ?
body:
Hey, who decided that Swain's W should be quickcast only ?

You're a dumbass. You are a complete fucking idiotic balancer and you should have no part in balancing League of Legends. This was an unneeded addition and you completely nerfed the fuck out of swain. Why even rework him if ur gonna nerf the fuck out of him with an only instantly castable W.? 

The whole point to playing Swain was that you would try to land the skillshot W, yet you made it only be able to be instantly castable.

you're a complete fucking dumbass with your balance "decision"; you let down every actual gamer with your shitty decision to make Swain's W only instantly castable.

fucking pathetic. Try to go back to social work or something since you obviously have zero idea how to balance a multiplayer PvP game.

replies.body: You do realize it being that way (is it even that way? Sounds like you messed up a local setting to me) wouldn't even be a *balance* decision, right? So why are getting upset at the balance team?

no, i played with the setting an regardless of how you set it, Swain;s W can ONLY be smartcasted. Even if you cast it normally...it's automatically smartcasted.

try it for yourself
Just did. Normal cast works for me. Are you sure you don't have Quickcast on for just that spell slot?

yeah now it works, 

i guess you hot fixed it ?

thanks. Now the W can actually be "slow"casted. That's super important for Swain and all I wanted. Thank you.

Yea I'm sure that's what happened.....
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

good point though; it wasnt a balance thing.

im upset because i went 17-6 in my last game as fiddle and still lost because a teammate went afk...
OP seems like a nice guy.
quickcast is the way to go. after a few swain games you *should* have a basic grasp of how the W works and be able to cast it without needing the indicator

keep your bronze opinions to yourself.

The "slow=cast" W and Q of swain is always useful.

quickcast is not always superior, so stfu and piss off with your dogmatic opinion
